entry.title: [BHS/RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA notification
entry.content:
Oct 21, 07:42 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 21, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 18, 20:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our NAS HA offer.

Start time : 21/10/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 21/10/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to close active NAS HA offers (0,3TB / 0,6TB / 1,2TB /2,4TB / 3,6TB / 7,2TB / 13,2TB / 19,4TB / 26,4TB).

This service closure notification concerns RBX (Roubaix, France), SBG (Strasbourg, France), and BHS (Beauharnois, Canada) locations only.
Affected customers were notified directly.

Thank you for your understanding.
